operation_config_data:
[DEFAULT]
cluster_server = beluga.genome.mcgill.ca
sequencing_center = McGill Genome Centre
cluster_submit_cmd_suffix = | grep "[0-9]" | cut -d\  -f4
cluster_other_arg = --mail-type=END,FAIL --mail-user=$JOB_MAIL -A $RAP_ID
cluster_work_dir_arg = -D
cluster_output_dir_arg = -o
cluster_job_name_arg = -J
cluster_cmd_produces_job_id = true
cluster_dependency_arg = --depend=afterok:
cluster_dependency_sep = :
cluster_max_jobs = 3000
tmp_dir = ${SLURM_TMPDIR}
portal_output_dir = $PORTAL_OUTPUT_DIR
cluster_walltime = 24:00:00
cluster_cpu = 1
cluster_node = 1
ALL_CPU = 40
HALF_CPU = 20
QUART_CPU = 10
PINT_CPU = 5
ALL_MEM = 187G
HALF_MEM = 90G
QUART_MEM = 60G
PINT_MEM = 30G
cluster_mem = 4700M per cpu
cluster_queue = 
LARGE_QUEUE = 
module_java = mugqic/java/openjdk-jdk1.8.0_72
module_mugqic_R_packages = mugqic/mugqic_R_packages/1.0.6
module_mugqic_tools = mugqic/mugqic_tools/2.8.1
module_pandoc = mugqic/pandoc/2.16.1
module_picard = mugqic/picard/2.0.1
module_python = mugqic/python/2.7.11
module_R = mugqic/R_Bioconductor/3.5.0_3.7
module_trimmomatic = mugqic/trimmomatic/0.35
module_kallisto = mugqic/kallisto/0.44.0
module_perl = mugqic/perl/5.22.1
scientific_name = Homo_sapiens
assembly = GRCh38
source = Ensembl
version = 104
assembly_dir = $MUGQIC_INSTALL_HOME/genomes/species/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s
annotations_prefix = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.%(source)s%(version)s
genome_fasta = %(assembly_dir)s/genome/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.fa
gtf = %(annotations_prefix)s.gtf
gtf_transcript_id = %(annotations_prefix)s.transcript_id.gtf
ribosomal_fasta = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/rrna_bwa_index/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.%(source)s%(version)s.rrna.fa
chromosome_size = %(assembly_dir)s/genome/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.fa.fai
genes = %(annotations_prefix)s.genes.tsv
gene_size = %(annotations_prefix)s.genes.length.tsv
gene_ontology = %(annotations_prefix)s.GO.tsv
annotation_flat = %(annotations_prefix)s.ref_flat.tsv
java_other_options = -XX:ParallelGCThreads=4
protocol = TrueSeq mRNA
cycle_number = 100
strand_info = fr-firststrand
ALL_MEM_EPS = 180G
GPU_QUEUE = 
common_name = Human
assembly_synonyms = hg38
dbsnp_version = 142
gnomad_exome = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.gnomad.exomes.r2.0.2.sites.no-VEP.nohist.tidy.vcf.gz
dbnsfp = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/dbNSFPv3.5a/dbNSFPv3.5a.txt.gz.txt.gz
af_gnomad = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.af-only-gnomad.vcf.gz
CTAT_bundle_version = GRCh38_gencode_v32_CTAT_lib_Dec062019
genome_mappability_bed_indexed = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/mappabilityGC/GRCh38_100bpPAIREDEND.exclusion.bed
population_AF = 1000Gp1_EUR_AF
excluded_chromosome = [picard_sam_to_fastq]
java_other_options = -XX:ParallelGCThreads=1 -Dsamjdk.buffer_size=4194304
ram = 16000G
cluster_mem = 16G

[trimmomatic]
cluster_mem = 20G
ram = 20G
cluster_cpu = %(QUART_CPU)s
threads = %(cluster_cpu)s
trailing_min_quality = 30
min_length = 32
illumina_clip_settings = :2:30:15:8:true
cluster_walltime = --time=24:00:0
java_other_options = -XX:ParallelGCThreads=5 -Dsamjdk.buffer_size=1048576

[kallisto]
transcriptome_idx = $MUGQIC_INSTALL_HOME/genomes/species/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s/annotations/cdna_kallisto_index/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.%(source)s%(version)s.cdna.fa.idx
transcript2genes = $MUGQIC_INSTALL_HOME/genomes/species/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s/annotations/cdna_kallisto_index/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.%(source)s%(version)s.tx2gene
cluster_walltime = 23:00:0
cluster_cpu = 10
bootstraps = 120
fragment_length = 120
fragment_length_sd = 20
cluster_mem = 42G

[kallisto_count_matrix]
cluster_walltime = --time=23:30:0
cluster_cpu = 2
cluster_mem = 24G

[gq_seq_utils_exploratory_analysis_rnaseq_light]
cluster_walltime = 00:30:0
cluster_cpu = 2
cluster_mem = 24G

[sleuth_differential_expression]
tx2gene = $MUGQIC_INSTALL_HOME/genomes/species/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.%(source)s%(version)s.tx2gene.csv
cluster_mem = 16G

[report]
title = RNA-Seq Light Analysis Report
cluster_walltime = 30:00

[run_checkmate]
bed = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.SNP_GRCh38_hg19_woChr.bed

[compute_effects]
snpeff_genome = %(assembly_synonyms)s

[conpair_concordance_contamination]
markers_bed = ${CONPAIR_DATA}/markers/%(assembly)s.autosomes.phase3_shapeit2_mvncall_integrated.20130502.SNV.genotype.sselect_v4_MAF_0.4_LD_0.8.liftover.bed
markers_txt = ${CONPAIR_DATA}/markers/%(assembly)s.autosomes.phase3_shapeit2_mvncall_integrated.20130502.SNV.genotype.sselect_v4_MAF_0.4_LD_0.8.liftover.txt

[gatk_mutect2]
pon = 

[amber]
loci = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.GermlineHetPon.vcf.gz

[cobalt]
gc_profile = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.GC_profile.1000bp.cnp

[purple]
gc_profile = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.GC_profile.1000bp.cnp

[report_cpsr]
assembly = grch38

[report_pcgr]
assembly = grch38

[delly_call_filter]
exclude_list = ${DELLY_PATH}/excludeTemplates/human.hg38.excl.tsv

[cnvkit_batch]
access = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.access-5k-mappable.bed
refFlat = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.UCSC.ref_flat.tsv

[wham_call_sv]
exclude = [run_arriba]
blacklist = $ARRIBA_HOME/database/blacklist_hg38_GRCh38_2018-01-13.tsv
operation_cmd_line:
module purge
module load python/3.10.2 mugqic/genpipes/4.2.0
rnaseq_light.py 
    -j slurm 
    -r readset.txt 
    -s 1-5 
    -c $MUGQIC_PIPELINES_HOME/pipelines/rnaseq_light/rnaseq_light.base.ini 
        $MUGQIC_PIPELINES_HOME/pipelines/common_ini/beluga.ini 
        $MUGQIC_PIPELINES_HOME/resources/genomes/config/Homo_sapiens.GRCh38.ini 
        RNA_light.custom.ini 
  > RNASeq_light_run.sh
rm -r RNA_CHUNKS;
mkdir RNA_CHUNKS;
$MUGQIC_PIPELINES_HOME/utils/chunk_genpipes.sh -n 100 RNASeq_light_run.sh RNA_CHUNKS
